remarks: The function ` F ` is the unique function defined by ` F `` A = B ` , provided that the well-definedness condition holds.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
statement:
flift.1 $e |- F = ran ( x e. X |-> <. A , B >. ) $.
flift.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. R ) $.
flift.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. S ) $.
fliftfuns $p |- ( ph -> ( Fun F <-> A. y e. X A. z e. X ( [_ y / x ]_ A = [_ z / x ]_ A -> [_ y / x ]_ B = [_ z / x ]_ B ) ) ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d F y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x z $.
$d x z $.
